title: Theme Switcher
description: A theme switcher on my personal site with a dark mode, and potentially more later on.

title: SeeClickFix Inverted Cut
description: A laser cut of the SeeClickFix logo, with a list of cities using it inverted over it. Now on display at the company offices.

title: Hanging Cat Ornament
description: A cat-themed laser cut decoration to celebrate a family member's pets.

title: New Haven 5K Road Race
description: My first 5k run. I finished, and will leave it at that.

title: Colored Laser Cut
description: I added color to a laser cut for the first time with paint pens.

title: First Vinyl-Cut Shirt
description: My first vinyl shirt's design was too big, but I could still wear it.

title: #Codeland Conference 2019
description: An enjoyable conference where I watched great talks and met several blogging friends in person for the first time.

title: Dev.To Distinguished Author Award
description: After a fortunate hot streak of Dev.To blog posts, I was rewarded with a thoughtful card and sticker collection.

title: Hanging Laser Cut
description: Two cuts of the same castle slipped together for a 3D laser cut hanging from my ceiling.

title: Laser Cut Anime Art
description: One of many laser cuts I've made combining anime artwork and a favorite quote.

title: Standing Laser Cut
description: The first time I laser cut an anime character to stand upright, not get stuck to a wall.

title: Monty Hall Dilemma
description: The Monty Hall Dilemma, a classic logic puzzle made with Vue.

title: Concentration
description: Remaking the classic number-matching game with Vue.

title: Vigenere Encryption
description: A Vue remake of the vigenere encryption cipher.

title: Anime Newsletter
description: A daily newsletter that uses Ruby sends me anime artwork.

title: Freeman's Mind Ipsum
description: A React Lorem Ipsum generator built from 'Freeman's Mind' quotes.

title: Anime Quote Image Maker
description: With a Quote API and a custom API endpoint, you can pair random quotes with anime artwork.

title: Multi Piece Laser Cut
description: Cutting artwork across multiple blocks and putting it back together. It's a fan favorite at MakeHaven.

title: Anime Quote Image Bot
description: This Node bot tweets random anime art paired with quotes, with poignant to bizarre results.

title: Snappy Jekyll
description: A boilerplate with Jekyll, Tailwind, and Turbolinks. For a site that's quick to develop and navigate.

title: Atomic Sass
description: My custom Sass folder structure and setup for Atomic CSS frameworks.

title: Eeveelution Quiz
description: A pokemon personality quiz built with and fully tested on Ember.

title: Commute Calculator
description: Calculate your commute length in days, hangovers, Game of Thrones finales, and more.

title: Number Guessing Game
description: An early but fun Anguar project giving hints to guess a random number.

title: SeeClickFix website
description: My first real work for SeeClickFix was remaking their public-facing marketing website, built on Jekyll.

title: EmberDex
description: My first personal project with Ember is an interactive PokeDex with the Pokemon API. Built with Ember Paper components.

title: Ace Attorney Ipsum
description: A Node lorem ipsum generator built with Ace Attorney quotes.

title: Hypnotic Spiral
description: Making an elegant black and white spiral of curves with CSS keyframe animations.
